channel.title: RP2040 on James Horton
channel.description: Recent content in RP2040 on James Horton

item.title: RP2040 PMod PCB
item.description: Having perviously built myself a Pico PMod Board around the Raspberry Pi Pico, I wanted to take this to the next level, and build myself a few boards from scratch. So once the orders went live for the RP2040 microcontroller a few months ago, I ordered some, and then did nothing with them for a while. Like many people, I seem to end up with more ideas than time and it took me a little while to get around to this one.
